body_html:
Hey, I had the same issue when trying to install Tensorflow in the Anaconda distribution of Python. I could fix it by installing tensorflow via this site: https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus

I found this in this thread: #1097

Cheers and keep on deep learning :)

body:
Hey, I had the same issue when trying to install Tensorflow in the Anaconda distribution of Python. I could fix it by installing tensorflow via this site: https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus

I found this in this thread: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1097

Cheers and keep on deep learning :)
